knxUltimateHueMotion.mapping_info: Link the KNX group address that should receive the motion detected state.
knxUltimateHueMotion.behaviour_info: Toggle the Node-RED output pin when you want to process Hue motion events in a flow without KNX.
knxUltimateHueMotion.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue motion events are still emitted to your flow.
